divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing on the steps of my back porch when I saw these five-seven lights moving very fast and the color was kind of orange at fisrt. That must have been because they came through the low scattered cloud cover and the lights from town shining up hindered the glow. Whatever they were, they were moving very fast. They were not in formation until they started to get out of the viewing area that I could see. They then formed a V formation, but all I could see was just three of them when they formed up. The objects were going due north on the east side of CLarion, again they were moving very fast. I just cannot believe what I saw. This is the second time I have seen lights in the skys over Clarion Pa. I'm 60 years old and lived in the country all my life and looked at the stars and airplanes at night and haven't seen anything. In the last six months this is the scond time. What on Gods earth is going on?
Summary: Five to seven lights spotted at first, moving very fast to the north of Clarion Pa.
trends: There have been 122 other sightings in Pittsburgh
There were no other sightings in Pittsburgh on or around April 3rd 2010
